price: Ey Muhammed! Eğer yüz çevirirlerse, artık sana düşen açık bir tebliğden ibarettir.
arabic: فَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَإِنَّمَا عَلَيۡكَ ٱلۡبَلَٰغُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: fa-in tawallaw fa-innamā ʿalayka al-balāghu al-mubīnu
